sent.orig: The world is getting organized, way too organized for me and some others.
sent.trans: 世界正在组织起来，对我和有些人说来太组织化了。

sent.orig: Corrupt practices and organized crime those involve organized labor.
sent.trans: 涉及工会的腐败行为和团伙犯罪。

sent.orig: Puzzled by the failure to get your across when you think you organized your presentation well?
sent.trans: 是否有时为不能有效表达自己而苦恼？尤其是自认为讲话组织得还可以之时？

sent.orig: Each essay should be composed in a well-organized manneran introduction and a conclusion.
sent.trans: 每篇短文应当组织好，包括简介和结论。

sent.orig: Many people have noted that the Germans and English are both methodical and well-organized.
sent.trans: 许多人指出德国人和英国人做事有条不紊且组织分明。
